Description: Web Application Infrastructure - Production-ready multi-AZ deployment with auto-scaling, CDN, and security controls

KeyPairName.Description: EC2 Key Pair for SSH access (leave empty to disable SSH)

AmiId.Description: AMI ID for EC2 instances (automatically gets latest Amazon Linux 2)

InstanceType.Description: EC2 instance type for web servers

OfficeIpAddress.Description: Office IP address for EC2 access (CIDR format)

DomainName.Description: Domain name for Route 53 and CloudFront

HostedZoneId.Description: Route 53 Hosted Zone ID (leave empty to skip Route 53 setup)

Properties.GroupDescription: Security group for web servers - restricted access from office IP
Security group for Application Load Balancer

LoadBalancerDNS.Description: DNS name of the Application Load Balancer

LoadBalancerURL.Description: URL of the Application Load Balancer

S3BucketName.Description: Name of the S3 bucket for static content

WebServerSecurityGroupId.Description: Security Group ID for web servers
